channel.title: How do you make a command a 1 time only use?

item.title: How do you make a command a 1 time only use?
item.dc:creator: @OWNER_2007 OWNER 2007
item.description:
@OWNER_2007 wrote:

This is directly from fr33sc4p3[code]
if (command.startsWith(“starter”)){
if(kitstarter >= 1)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " Is a greedy twat who got a blackmark");

BufferedWriter bw = null;
try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“logs/blackmarks.txt”, true));
bw.write(playerName+" Tryed to Cheat, black mark! ");
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
blackmark +=1;
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“Error with black mark logging!”);
}
}

}
else if(kitstarter <= 0){

kitstarter +=1;
BufferedWriter bw = null;

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " Got their starter kit get your’s by typing ::starter");
addItem(995,200000000);
addItem(6583,1);
addItem(1053,1);
addItem(1055,1);
addItem(1057,1);
addItem(3140,1);
try {
bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“logs/starters.txt”, true));
bw.write(playerName+" Got their starter pack ");
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw != null) try {
bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“Error with stater pack logging!”);
}
}
}[/code]Just use that and change what they add

item.title: How do you make a command a 1 time only use?
item.dc:creator: @newservermaker newservermaker
item.description:
@newservermaker wrote:

i have a starter kit and this si what i have:

if(command.startsWith("starter")) { addItem(995, 100000); addItem( 1153, 1); addItem( 1191, 1); addItem( 1115, 1); addItem( 1323, 1); addItem( 1067, 1); addItem(555, 100); addItem(556, 100); addItem(557, 100); addItem(554, 100); sendMessage("You just got your starter kit!");

how do i make it so it can only b used once?
